title: Shabandar
text: Shabandar (, also <a href="Romanize">Romanize</a>d as Sha‘bāndar and Shaban Dar; also known as Shab Bīdār and Shab Dar) is a village in <a href="Sepiddasht%20Rural%20District">Sepiddasht Rural District</a>, <a href="Papi%20District">Papi District</a>, <a href="Khorramabad%20County">Khorramabad County</a>, <a href="Lorestan%20Province">Lorestan Province</a>, <a href="Iran">Iran</a>. At the 2006 census, its population was 249, in 50 families.
